metadata.name: Beyond forever
metadata.description:
The series 'Deconstructing life' is artist's attempt to explore various facets of human experience. At it's core, life can be understood as the experience of existence, the manifestation of being in the world, and the process of self creation. Through out the series, different experiences( mostly inspired from artist's personal life ) will be pondered upon and explored further.

Episode 1 : Love.

in life, they were shunned, their love was a crime,  
But in hell, they were free, for there was no time.  
They danced in the flames, a macabre ballet,  
Their love was so real, it would never decay.

The demons looked on, with envy and awe,  
For the love that they shared, was without any flaw.  
They watched as they kissed, and they held each other tight,  
Their love was eternal, it would never take flight.

In hell, they were together, forever they'll stay,  
Their love was so strong, it would never decay.  
For even in death, their passion still burns,  
And in each other's arms, their love forever yearns.
